Room.Name: In a foyer filled with a green aura
Room.Description: This room in the tower foyer has a sickly green light radiating from the walls. A feeling of unholy dread seeps through you, and it is as if there were some kind of divine force watching from nearbye. To the south is a large green door leading back to the ruins.

Room.Name: In a foyer filled with a green aura
Room.Description: This room in the tower foyer has a sickly green light radiating from the walls. A feeling of unholy dread seeps through you, and it is as if there were some kind of divine force watching from nearbye.

Room.Name: In a foyer filled with a green aura
Room.Description: This room in the tower foyer has a sickly green light radiating from the walls. A feeling of unholy dread seeps through you, and it is as if there were some kind of divine force watching from nearbye.

Room.Name: In a foyer filled with a green aura
Room.Description: This room in the tower foyer has a sickly green light radiating from the walls. A feeling of unholy dread seeps through you, and it is as if there were some kind of divine force watching from nearbye.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a corridor bathed in a green glow
Room.Description: There is a strong hazy glow of sickly green light filtering through the air and bathing you in warm energy. All around you there is a strong feeling of a divine prescence watching you.

Room.Name: In a room with a green fountain
Room.Description: This room is humming with the sound of magical energy of some divine nature. In the centre is a fountain which is glowing with a sickly green aura. In all directions around you there are strong steel doors, and a stairwell leads down.

Room.Name: In a sparse room
Room.Description: The room is empty except for the insistent glow of sickly green that hangs throughout the tower air. The only exit is a door in the west wall.

Room.Name: In a meditation room
Room.Description: This room has the trappings of a cleric's retreat. Except the symbols hanging on the walls are dusty with neglect and the cross that hangs over the door is inverted and covered in blood. The only exit is back south through the doorway.

Room.Name: In a room of healing
Room.Description: This room has been set up for the recuperation of patients who may have been hurt during fights or on hunting trips. Except that right now it appears the beds are soaked in blood and there are no patients, just long dead skeletons of elves who were brought here for aid. The only exit is east through the doorway.

Room.Name: In the holy place
Room.Description: This shrine is bathed in a glaring sickly green light that warms you with it's unholy energy. The holy symbols and tablets scattered about the room are dust covered and bloody, signs that the times of peace are long gone in this place. There is a door leading north, and a stairway heading up.

Room.Name: Ascending into an unholy green light
Room.Description: You have stepped into a glaring green light that sends flowing warmth through your body. Despite this warm feeling it has sends a sickly shudder through you as it penetrates your very bones. Below you is a stairwell leading down into a room, and there are doors in the north and south walls.

Room.Name: In an unholy green light
Room.Description: You stand in the flowing green light that permeates this tower. From here you can see the glaring green light is filtering in from above you. There is a door to the north that helps to stem the flood of light into the lower level.

Room.Name: In an unholy green light
Room.Description: You stand in the flowing green light that permeates this tower. From here you can see the glaring green light is filtering in from above you. There is a door to the south that helps to stem the flood of light into the lower level.

Room.Name: In a burning green light of unholy fire
Room.Description: You have stepped into a light of sickly green that is so intense it burns the skin and sears your eyes. All around you there is the ringing sound of deep chanting in some arcane tongue, but you are able to hear that the tone is one of dark evil. Below you is a way down through the light, and to the south is the source of the unholy energy that surges around you.

Room.Name: In a burning green light of unholy fire
Room.Description: You have stepped into a light of sickly green that is so intense it burns the skin and sears your eyes. All around you there is the ringing sound of deep chanting in some arcane tongue, but you are able to hear that the tone is one of dark evil. Below you is a way down through the light, and to the north is the source of the unholy energy that surges around you.

Room.Name: Within the unholy fire
Room.Description: The room here is burning in unholy green fire. The light from it blasts out of the room north and south into the rest of the tower, but it is here that the green light is of burning intensity. You can practically feel the heat of the flames searing your soul, and a divine prescence can be felt watching and enjoying the light as it gathers power.

NPC.name: spirit priest
NPC.description: This ghostly apparition seems to float through the green air around it in total bliss. A gleam of dark red glistens in it's eyes as it turns to regard your warm flesh.
NPC.longDescription: A transparent figure in clerical garb floats in the air.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric Warrior Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sneak Flying DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead novice
NPC.description: This elf fell to the evil that destroyed the city and is now living forever in his room where he once sought to be a priest of healing.
NPC.longDescription: A disfigured elf in torn black priest's robes is standing here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Undead Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Sneak Flying DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lich cleric
NPC.description: This mighty cleric of ancient Myth Drannor has been preserved by the evil that rules the region as both a reminder of how weak willed good really are, and as a source of power to draw upon when the time grows near to release the lord of the ruins.
NPC.longDescription: An elf wearing robes of the inverted cross raises an arm to bless you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Haste DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead elven healer
NPC.description: He once healed those elves who fell in the fight against the evil, but now lives as a reminder of how the weak are used and the evil control them.
NPC.longDescription: A withered elf in priest's garb reaches out to cure your soul.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead elven bishop
NPC.description: The undead elf's eyes stare back at you with unholy fury!
NPC.longDescription: An undead elven bishop is here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Haste DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: dark angel
NPC.description: There is a darkness about these beings that defies words. Their faces are as cold as ice and their eyes burn with the fury of unholy wrath. They are here by summons of the Lord to help guard the power that is building up towards his release.

NPC.name: undead elven cardinal
NPC.description: Once one of the grand lords of Myth Drannor this cardinal is now the keeper of the unholy power building up within the tower. He has been restored to undead life as a cruel reminder that good will not always triumph, and he watches over the power that will one day help release the Lord of the ruins.
NPC.longDescription: An elf with a bare skull for a face prepares your final rites!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Haste DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

Item.Name: parchment green tinted seal
Item.LongDescription: A piece of parchment scrawled with green writing is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The writing on the parchment relates how the elves of Myth Drannor were used as sacrifices to provide the pure blood needed to help raise and evil of total corruption and unspeakable power that lay dormant beneath the city. Thie red bloodletting was to be accompanied by two other merging powers, that of the pure magics, the blue energies, and the divine magics, green energies. Yet something went wrong and now forces of darkness are fighting for the last keys to the power that lies hidden. Once the red, blue and green are finally joined the black tower will reveal it's secrets..

Item.Name: mace disruption
Item.LongDescription: A large mace thrumming with power is on the floor.

Item.Name: chain shard obsidian crystal
Item.LongDescription: A shard of obsidian on a thin chain is here.

Item.Name: sceptre heavenly heaven orders
Item.ShortDescription: a sceptre of the heavenly orders
Item.LongDescription: A large ornate sceptre is lying here.

Item.Name: green mitre
Item.LongDescription: A green coloured mitre for the clergy is here.

Item.Name: dark scimitar flesh-cutter cutter
Item.LongDescription: A scimitar of dark material lies burning on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: This nasty looking scimitar is unlike any you have ever seen before. It has a far different weight and balance to any other sword you have ever seen, and it's certainly not a very sturdy blade compared to many you have seen. In fact it looks quite pathetic as far as weapons go, although the cruel form of it's serated flesh-cutting edges could do some serious damage to a person's body if they managed to cut it right.

Item.Name: green emerald bracer
Item.LongDescription: A loop of emerald lies here gathering dust.

Item.Name: ivory amulet heaven
Item.LongDescription: A large amulet of ivory is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A large plain key is lying here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A large plain key is lying here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A large plain key is lying here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A large plain key is lying here.

Item.Name: opal shield
Item.LongDescription: A shield of polished opal is on the ground.

Item.Name: skull cap
Item.ShortDescription: a cap made from an elven skull
Item.LongDescription: The remains of an elf's skull is on the ground.

Item.Name: fountain
Item.LongDescription: A fountain with a sickly green aura is here.
